Hello,

nit.

I overwrite the met=
hode testStarted(Description).

 this description. I mean an instance of this class or the reference of the=
 instance of the class.

ation, which descripes the testgroup. And I want to get the value of this a=
nnotation. Therefor I need a instance of the testclass.
